task: Develop a basic 'Mancala' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'How would you have done it?'.
name: Mancala Reimagined

branding_data.short_description: Experience the classic Mancala game with a creative twist in Mancala Reimagined.
branding_data.detailed_description: Mancala Reimagined takes the traditional board game of Mancala and infuses it with a unique twist inspired by the oblique strategy 'How would you have done it?'. Players will engage in the timeless gameplay of capturing stones and strategizing their moves while encountering new, unexpected rules and scenarios that challenge their conventional thinking. The game encourages players to rethink their approach, offering a fresh perspective on a beloved classic. With its blend of familiar mechanics and innovative twists, Mancala Reimagined provides both nostalgic and novel experiences for players of all ages.

strategy: How would you have done it?
